org.opentcs.util.eventsystem

类 SynchronousEventHub<E extends Event>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opentcs.util.eventsystem.EventHub<E>
      • org.opentcs.util.eventsystem.SynchronousEventHub<E>
  • 类型参数:
    E - The actual event implementation.
    所有已实现的接口:
    EventListener<E>, EventSource<E>
    已过时。 
    For event handling, use classes in org.opentcs.util.event instead.

    @Deprecated
 @ScheduledApiChange(when="5.0",
                    details="Will be removed.")
public class SynchronousEventHub<E extends Event>
extends EventHub<E>
    An EventHub implementation that dispatches events synchronously, i.e. in the context of the thread executing processEvent().
